Race.SpecificTitle: Councilman -- District D, City of Bogalusa
City of Bogalusa (Sales Tax Renewal) -- 1% S&U - CC - Perp.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Bogalusa Proposition
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Bogalusa renew the levy and continue to collect a permanent sales and use tax of one percent (1%), beginning June 1, 2017, under the Uniform Local Sales Tax Law (estimated annual revenues: $2,400,000), with the net proceeds to be used for the following purposes: (i) 15% for constructing, acquiring, improving, extending, maintaining and operating waterworks, sewers and sewage disposal facilities; (ii) 25% for constructing, acquiring, improving, extending, maintaining and operating streets and drainage facilities; (iii) 15% for acquiring land, buildings, equipment and other permanent properties or for their preservation, development, operation or permanent  improvement and for equipment maintenance; and (iv) 45% to the City's General Fund for any lawful municipal purpose; and shall the City be authorized to fund the proceeds of this sales tax into bonds from time to time to construct, acquire, extend and/or improve municipal capital improvements, to the extent and in the manner permitted by the laws of Louisiana, including La. R.S. 39:698.1 et seq., and other applicable authority?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Bogalusa (Fire Department) -- 2.71 Mills - CC - 10 Yrs
Race.SummaryText:
City of Bogalusa Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
(Fire Department)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Bogalusa renew the levy and continue to collect a special tax of two and seventy-one hundredths (2.71) mills on all the property subject to taxation within said City (estimated annual revenues: $190,000), for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, inclusive, for the purpose of maintaining fire department stations and equipment, and for paying the general operations thereof and salaries of the personnel of the fire department?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Bogalusa (Sew./Water/Sts./Pks.) -- 2.71 Mills - CC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Bogalusa Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
(Sewerage, Water, Streets and Parks)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Bogalusa renew the levy and continue to collect a special tax of two and seventy-one hundredths (2.71) mills on all the property subject to taxation within said City (estimated annual revenues: $190,000), for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, inclusive, for the purpose of maintaining sewerage and water works and other works of permanent improvement under the jurisdiction of the Department of Streets and Parks?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Bogalusa (Municipal Services) -- 3.62 Mills - CC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of Bogalusa Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
(Municipal Services)
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Bogalusa renew the levy and continue to collect a special tax of three and sixty-two hundredths (3.62) mills on all the property subject to taxation within said City (estimated annual revenues: $254,000), for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, inclusive, for the purpose of providing municipal services in the City, and for the maintenance and operation of municipal services departments, including the acquisition of necessary equipment therefor, and paying salaries of the personnel of said departments?
